> é¡¹ç›®ä½ç½®ï¼š/example/lib/best_flutter_ui ## ğŸ› æ¶æ„ ![fair architecture](resources/fair.png) ## ğŸš€ å¿«é€Ÿæ¥å…¥ ç®€å•å‡ æ­¥ï¼Œæ¥å…¥Fair. **step1ï¼šåŒæ­¥fairå·¥ç¨‹ä»£ç ** æ¨èåŒæ­¥ [fair](https://github.com/wuba/fair) ç›¸å…³ä»£ç ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿›è¡Œæœ¬åœ°ä¾èµ–ï¼š åŒæ­¥æ–¹å¼: ``` git clone https://github.com/wuba/fair.git ``` **step2ï¼šåœ¨ `pubspec.yaml` æ·»åŠ ä¾èµ–** å°†Fairå·¥ç¨‹å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„ä¸šåŠ¡å·¥ç¨‹æ”¾åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªç›®å½•ä¸­ï¼Œå¹¶æ·»åŠ ä¾èµ–: ```yaml # add Fair dependency dependencies: fair: 3.2.1 # add build_runner and compiler dependency dev_dependencies: build_runner: ^2.0.0 fair_compiler: ^1.7.0 # switch "fair_version" according to the local Flutter SDK version # Flutter SDK 3.7.x(3.7.0ã€3.7.1ã€3.7.2ã€3.7.3ã€3.7.4ã€3.7.5ã€3.7.6ã€3.7.7ã€3.7.8ã€3.7.9ã€3.7.10) -> flutter_3_7_0 # Flutter SDK 3.3.x(3.3.0ã€3.3.1ã€3.3.2ã€3.3.3ã€3.3.4ã€3.3.5ã€3.3.6ã€3.3.7ã€3.3.8ã€3.3.9ã€3.3.10) -> flutter_3_3_0 # Flutter SDK 3.0.x(3.0.0ã€3.0.1ã€3.0.2ã€3.0.3ã€3.0.4ã€3.0.5) -> flutter_3_0_0 # Flutter SDK 2.10.x(2.10.0ã€2.10.1ã€2.10.2ã€2.10.3) -> flutter_2_10_0 # Flutter SDK 2.8.x(2.8.0ã€2.8.1) -> flutter_2_8_0 # Flutter SDK 2.5.x(2.5.0ã€2.5.1ã€2.5.2ã€2.5.3) -> flutter_2_5_0 # Flutter SDK 2.0.6 -> flutter_2_0_6 # Flutter SDK 1.22.6 -> flutter_1_22_6 dependency_overrides: fair_version: path: ../fair/flutter_version/flutter_3_7_0 ``` **step3ï¼šå°†Appæ›¿æ¢ä¸ºFairApp** ```dart void main() { WidgetsFlutterBinding.ensureInitialized(); FairApp.runApplication( _getApp(), plugins: { }, ); } dynamic _getApp() => FairApp( modules: { }, delegate: { }, child: MaterialApp( home: FairWidget( name: 'DynamicWidget', path: 'assets/bundle/lib_src_page_dynamic_widget.fair.json', data: {"fairProps": json.encode({})}), ), ); ``` **step4ï¼šæ·»åŠ FairWidgetä½œä¸ºåŠ¨æ€Widget** ```dart FairWidget( name: 'DynamicWidget', path: 'assets/bundle/lib_src_page_dynamic_widget.fair.json', data: {"fairProps": json.encode({})}), ``` ## ğŸ§°é…å¥—å·¥å…· fair å¼€å‘ææ•ˆå·¥å…· ### Dartå‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…· [faircli](https://pub.dev/packages/faircli) ä¸€é”®åˆ›å»ºfairå·¥ç¨‹ **faircliå®‰è£…** ```dart dart pub global activate faircli ``` **åˆ›å»ºåŠ¨æ€åŒ–å·¥ç¨‹** ```dart faircli create -n dynamic_project_name ``` **åˆ›å»ºè½½ä½“å·¥ç¨‹** ```dart faircli create -k carrier -n carrier_project_name ``` ### IDEAæ’ä»¶ [FairTemplate](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/20323-fairtemplate) æä¾›å¸¸ç”¨é¡µé¢/ç»„ä»¶æ¨¡æ¿ä»£ç  ### é…å¥—å·¥å…·ä½¿ç”¨æµç¨‹ ![fair tools](resources/fair_tools.png) ### é…å¥—å·¥å…·ä½¿ç”¨æ•ˆæœ ä½¿ç”¨fairclié…ç½®å¥½æœ¬åœ°çš„çƒ­æ›´æœåŠ¡åï¼Œåœ¨ç§»åŠ¨è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šæ‰“å¼€å¼€å‘è€…é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æœ¬åœ°æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œè¾“å…¥å¼€å‘æœºipï¼Œé¢„è§ˆfairåŠ¨æ€åŒ–æ•ˆæœ
æ›´å¤šä»‹ç»è¯·æŸ¥çœ‹ [æ–‡æ¡£](fair_tools.md) ## âš™ï¸fair-onlineäº‘å¼€å‘å¹³å° Fair-Online æ˜¯é¢å‘Flutter å¼€å‘è€…ï¼Œæä¾›ä»Flutter åœ¨çº¿å¼€å‘ï¼Œåˆ°å®æ—¶ç¼–è¯‘é¢„è§ˆï¼Œæ‰“åŒ…å‘å¸ƒã€åŠ¨æ€ä¸‹å‘ç«¯ä¾§æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå®ç°Flutter çº¿ä¸ŠåŠ¨æ€åŒ–çš„ä¸€ä½“åŒ–äº‘å¼€å‘å¹³å°ã€‚ å¼€å‘è€…æ— éœ€é…ç½®Flutter å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒï¼Œåœ¨çº¿å¼€å‘è°ƒè¯•ä»£ç ï¼Œå³æ—¶ç¼–è¯‘é¢„è§ˆï¼Œæ‰€è§å³æ‰€å¾—ï¼Œç»“åˆ58å¼€æºå›¢é˜Ÿæ‰“é€ çš„Flutter åŠ¨æ€åŒ–æ¡†æ¶ Fair åŠçƒ­æ›´æ–°å¹³å° FairPushy ï¼Œå®ç°Flutter çº¿ä¸ŠåŠ¨æ€åŒ–ã€‚

ğŸ”§ä¸€èµ·å…±å»º é€šè¿‡[Issue](https://github.com/wuba/fair/issues)æäº¤é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè´¡çŒ®ä»£ç èµ°Pull Requestï¼Œç®¡ç†å‘˜å°†å¯¹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œå®¡æ ¸ã€‚ å¯¹Fairæ„Ÿå…´è¶£çš„å°ä¼™ä¼´ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åŠ å…¥äº¤æµç¾¤ã€‚æŠ€æœ¯å’¨è¯¢ã€è®¨è®ºï¼Œè¯·ç§»æ­¥è‡³ | å¾®ä¿¡å°ç§˜ä¹¦ | å¾®ä¿¡ç¾¤ | |--------------------------|--------------------------| | ![wechat](resources/weixin.jpeg) | ![wechat_group](resources/wechat-group-02.png) | > å¾®ä¿¡å…¥ç¾¤ï¼šè¯·å…ˆæ·»åŠ 58æŠ€æœ¯å°ç§˜ä¹¦ä¸ºå¥½å‹ï¼Œå¤‡æ³¨fairï¼Œå°ç§˜ä¹¦é‚€è¯·è¿›ç¾¤ã€‚ ## âš ï¸æš‚ä¸æ”¯æŒåŠŸèƒ½ ç”±äºdartè¯­æ³•è§£æå·¥ä½œé‡å¥‡å¤§ï¼Œä¼šæœ‰éƒ¨åˆ†è¯­æ³•å’Œç‰¹æ®Šä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼çš„é™åˆ¶ã€‚ ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€äº›ï¼Œä¸æ”¯æŒç‰¹æ€§&å·²çŸ¥é—®é¢˜ï¼š * é“¾å¼ç‚¹è¯­æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚ï¼šColors.black.withOpacity(0.59)ï¼ŒColors.xxxæœ¬èº«æ˜¯æ”¯æŒçš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å†æ¬¡è½¬æ¢é€æ˜çš„åˆ™ä¸æ”¯æŒ * ç±»çš„ç»§æ‰¿ä¸æ”¯æŒ æŸ¥é˜…æ›´å¤šä¸æ”¯æŒå†…å®¹ï¼Œè¯·ç§»æ­¥è‡³[![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/flutter_fair/community.svg)](https://gitter.im/flutter_fair/community?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge) ## ğŸ§¯FAQ **è‡ªæŸ¥æ­¥éª¤ï¼ˆæ–°æ‰‹å¿…è¯»ï¼‰** 1. æ ¸å¯¹flutterç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸readmeè¯´æ˜ï¼Œç¡®è®¤è¯¥ç‰ˆæœ¬å·²è¢«Fairæ”¯æŒ 2. æ ¸æŸ¥versionåˆ†æ”¯ç‰ˆæœ¬äºflutterä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸”ç­‰åŒäºç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ç‰ˆæœ¬å· 2. å¦‚æœå°šæœªçœ‹è¿‡[æ–‡æ¡£](https://fair.58.com)ï¼Œè¯·å…ˆè¿è¡Œè‡ªå¸¦çš„sampleï¼Œèƒ½è·‘èµ·æ¥å†æ¥å…¥app 3. é‡åˆ°ç¼–è¯‘é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·æŸ¥çœ‹ç»ˆç«¯æ—¥å¿—ï¼Œè¿‡æ»¤fairå…³é”®è¯ 4. ä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€åŒ–ç»„ä»¶çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œä¸å»ºè®®æ ¼å¼åŒ–ç”Ÿæˆçš„Javascriptæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ ¼å¼åŒ–å·¥å…·å¯èƒ½ä¼šä¿®æ”¹æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æ‰§è¡ŒæŠ¥é”™ 5. åˆ°githubæissueï¼Œæˆ–gitterã€‚ç•™æ¡£/è§£å†³ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›flutterç¯å¢ƒä¿¡æ¯`flutter doctor --verbose` --- * ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ²¡æœ‰binäº§ç‰©ï¼Ÿ binä¸ºå¯é€‰çš„flatbufferäº§ç‰©ï¼Œfair 2æœŸå¼€æºäº† faircå’Œdart2jsç¼–è¯‘è½¬æ¢å·¥å…·ã€‚ * æ‰§è¡Œflutter pub run build_runner buildåæ²¡æœ‰äº§ç‰©ï¼Ÿ è¯·æ ¹æ®é€‚é…è¦æ±‚ï¼Œæ ¸æŸ¥flutterï¼Œdartç‰ˆæœ¬ * æ‰§è¡Œflutter pub run build_runner buildåï¼Œæç¤ºç¼–è¯‘é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Ÿ æ ¹æ®é”™è¯¯æ—¥å¿—ï¼Œæœ‰å‡ ç§æƒ…å†µï¼š1.åŸä»£ç ä¸­å­˜åœ¨é€»è¾‘è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œè¯­æ³•è§£æä¸é€šè¿‡ï¼Œå°è¯•å‰¥ç¦»é€»è¾‘ä¸ºmoduleï¼›2.`.dart_tool`æ–‡ä»¶æƒé™é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·åˆ é™¤åé‡è¯• ## files.name: README.md
files.content:
![social preview](resources/social-dark.png)

[ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡](README-zh.md)|[English](README.md) --- Fair is a dynamic framework designed for Flutter. Through the automatic conversion of native Dart source files by the Fair Compiler tool, the project can obtain the ability to dynamically update the Widget Tree and State. The goal of creating Fair is to support updates through business bundles and JS distribution without the release of versions (Android, iOS, Web), similar to React Native. After integrating with Flutter Fair, you can quickly publish new pages without waiting for your app's next release date. Fair provides standard widgets, which can be used as a new dynamic page or as part of an existing Flutter page, such as typography/style modification of operation bits, full page replacement, partial replacement, etc. ![](resources/what-is-fair-en.png) Fair's UI rendering is lossless and can be restored at the pixel level. Take a look at the effect of escaping some pages of Best Flutter UI Templates: ![best-ui-template](resources/best-ui-template.png) > The project used is from https://github.com/mitesh77/Best-Flutter-UI-Templates
> locationï¼š/example/lib/best_flutter_ui ## ğŸ›Architecture ![fair architecture](resources/fair.png) ## ğŸš€ Running Use Flutter Fair require few steps. **step1ï¼šdownload fair project source code** It is recommended to download [fair](https://github.com/wuba/fair) to the local and dependencies on the relative path. The download method is as follows: ``` git clone https://github.com/wuba/fair.git ``` **step2ï¼šAdd dependency inside `pubspec.yaml`** Assuming that the fair project and your own project are in the same folder: ```yaml # add Fair dependency dependencies: fair: 3.2.1 # add build_runner and compiler dependency dev_dependencies: build_runner: ^2.0.0 fair_compiler: ^1.7.0 # switch "fair_version" according to the local Flutter SDK version # Flutter SDK 3.7.x(3.7.0ã€3.7.1ã€3.7.2ã€3.7.3ã€3.7.4ã€3.7.5ã€3.7.6ã€3.7.7ã€3.7.8ã€3.7.9ã€3.7.10) -> flutter_3_7_0 # Flutter SDK 3.3.x(3.3.0ã€3.3.1ã€3.3.2ã€3.3.3ã€3.3.4ã€3.3.5ã€3.3.6ã€3.3.7ã€3.3.8ã€3.3.9ã€3.3.10) -> flutter_3_3_0 # Flutter SDK 3.0.x(3.0.0ã€3.0.1ã€3.0.2ã€3.0.3ã€3.0.4ã€3.0.5) -> flutter_3_0_0 # Flutter SDK 2.10.x(2.10.0ã€2.10.1ã€2.10.2ã€2.10.3) -> flutter_2_10_0 # Flutter SDK 2.8.x(2.8.0ã€2.8.1) -> flutter_2_8_0 # Flutter SDK 2.5.x(2.5.0ã€2.5.1ã€2.5.2ã€2.5.3) -> flutter_2_5_0 # Flutter SDK 2.0.6 -> flutter_2_0_6 # Flutter SDK 1.22.6 -> flutter_1_22_6 dependency_overrides: fair_version: path: ../fair/flutter_version/flutter_3_7_0 ``` **step3ï¼šWrap your app with FairApp Widget** ```dart void main() { WidgetsFlutterBinding.ensureInitialized(); FairApp.runApplication( _getApp(), plugins: { }, ); } dynamic _getApp() => FairApp( modules: { }, delegate: { }, child: MaterialApp( home: FairWidget( name: 'DynamicWidget', path: 'assets/bundle/lib_src_page_dynamic_widget.fair.json', data: {"fairProps": json.encode({})}), ), ); ``` **step4ï¼šImport a dynamic widget as FairWidget** ```dart FairWidget( name: 'DynamicWidget', path: 'assets/bundle/lib_src_page_dynamic_widget.fair.json', data: {"fairProps": json.encode({})}), ``` ## DevTools fair development tools ### Dart Commandline Tool [faircli](https://pub.dev/packages/faircli) create fair project **faircli install** ```dart dart pub global activate faircli ``` **create fair dynamic project** ```dart faircli create -n dynamic_project_name ``` **create fair carrier project** ```dart faircli create -k carrier -n carrier_project_name ``` ### IDEA Plugin [FairTemplate](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/20323-fairtemplate) Page/Component Template Code ### DevTools flow chart ![fair tools](resources/fair_tools.png) ### DevTools demo After using faircli to configure the local hot update service, open the developer options on the mobile device, select the local mode, enter the ip of the development machine, then preview fair dynamic effect
For more details, please refer to [fair_tools](fair_tools.md) ## Fair-Online Platform Fair-Online is an integrated cloud development platform for Flutter developers, from online development of Flutter, to real-time compilation and preview, packaging and publishing, and dynamic release of end-side updates, to realize the dynamic online Flutter. Developers do not need to configure the Flutter development environment, develop and debug code online, compile and preview in real time, and what you see is what you get. Combined with the Flutter dynamic framework Fair and the hot update platform FairPushy created by the 58 open source team, Flutter online dynamics are realized.
Online experience URL: [Fair-Online Platform](https://fair-online.58.com/) For more details, please refer to [fair_online](./fair_online/README.md) ## Documentation For more details, please refer to [https://fair.58.com](https://fair.58.com) ### Tools Fair Cli: [Fair_CLI](https://pub.dev/packages/faircli) IEDA plugin: [jetbrains_plugin_fair_template](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/20323-fairtemplate) Hot update platform: [FAIR PUSHY](https://github.com/wuba/FairPushy) ## versions ## 3.10.0 updateDate: 2023.08.15 - Adapted to Flutter 3.10.0, released Fair Version 3.10 - Fix known bugs, fix DSL parser issues ### 3.2.1 updateDateï¼š2023.04.13 - Fixed some issues. ### 3.2.0 updateDateï¼š2023.04.12 - Adjust the order of dispose calls, not above the tree, subsequent operations stop - Add generic FairPlugin js and dart code, reuse the same interaction logic, add example comments - Json parsing compatibility - Add exception catching and log printing when executeFunction is called with V8 engine in Android - Fix SliverGridDelegateWithFixedCrossAxisCount conversion error. - SugarMap and SugarMapEach inputs support other Sugar expressions - Optimize the performance of ifEqual ifEqualBool switchCase - Fix Domain not recognizing index and item in sugar - Make AOT also follow conditions before executing code - Fix SugarMap and SugarMapEach set input does not support other Sugar syntax - Abstract Domain, add IndexDomain, MapEachDomain, support nested Domains - New FunctionDomain generic Domain, generate corresponding parameters for function callbacks for FunctionDomain to use. - Added NullableIndexedWidgetBuilder, IndexedWidgetBuilder, WidgetBuilder, TransitionBuilder common Sugar support - Some known issues fixed ### 3.1.0 updateDateï¼š2023.03.14 - Upgrade analyzer library to 5.5.0; - Dart function to JS supports parameter passing; - JS Object value compatibility; - Remove kotlin dependencies from fair/android; - Add custom parsing for IconData; - The generation of optional positional parameters is modified to obtain pa; - Fixed missing OptionalPositional default values; - Remove the generation time from the generation.fair. dart comment; - Added the ignore unnecessary_import operation; - Fixed incorrect assignment of Sugar.switchCase key and defaultValue; - binding was changed to SplayTreeMap to increase search efficiency, especially for lists, where duplicate tags are searched for a short time; - Exposing specialBinding so that users can override a value; - When the provider is added to the _binding, the Settings set by the user prevail for quick modification; - Fixed the loadCoreJs package splicing problem; - Reduced minSdkVersion to 16; - runApplication supports specifying the package in which the JS resides; - Fixed error in calling context in the _reload method. ### 3.0.0 updateDateï¼š2022.11.17 - Fix class constructor parsing exception. - Fair Compatible Web. - Bindmap logic optimization. ### 2.8.1 updateDateï¼š2022.11.01 - Fixedï¼šCustomScrollView reference external function builder bug. ### 2.8.0 updateDateï¼š2022.10.21 - Add support of Flutter SDK 3.3.0+. - Add Sugarï¼šSugar.isNestedScrollViewHeaderSliversBuilderã€Sugar.isButtonStyleã€Sugar.isDurationã€Sugar.popMenuButtonã€Sugar.sliverChildBuilderDelegateã€Sugar.sliverGridDelegateWithFixedCrossAxisCount. - Fixed some bugs. ### 2.7.0 updateDateï¼š2022.08.10 - Add support of Flutter SDK 3.0.0ã€3.0.1ã€3.0.2ã€3.0.3ã€3.0.4ã€3.0.5. - Fixed some bugs. #### Fair - Fair supports loading bundle files on the phone disk path; - Adapt to Flutter SDK 2.10.0, 2.10.1, 2.10.2, 2.10.3; - Dart2JS supports parsing static methods; - When running, the page error message prompts optimization; - Syntactic sugar supports parsing Model data. ### 2.6.0 updateDateï¼š2022.07.05 #### Fair - Fair supports loading bundle files on the phone disk path; - Adapt to Flutter SDK 2.10.0, 2.10.1, 2.10.2, 2.10.3; - Dart2JS supports parsing static methods; - When running, the page error message prompts optimization; - Syntactic sugar supports parsing Model data. ### 2.5.0 updateDateï¼š2022.05.31 #### Fair Adapt to flutter SDK 2.8.0, 2.8.1 Dart2js supports parsing singletons New syntax Sugar.switchCaseã€Sugar.colorsWithOpacityã€Sugar.convertToString, etc #### example Comprehensively optimize the example structure and upgrade the example experience, which is more suitable for beginners. In the source code, an example project is added to provide the standard usage of fair API. example locationï¼š`fair/example` ### v2.4.1 updateDateï¼š2022.05.12 Fix FairLogger import problem. Upgrade Analyzer to 2.3.0. ### v2.4.0 updateDateï¼š2022.04.26 FlatBuffers supports generating bin files in a null safe environment ### v2.3.0 updateDate: 2022.04.22 #### Fair supports null-safe Adapt to Flutter SDK 2.5.0, 2.5.1, 2.5.2, 2.5.3 and other versions #### demo Upgrade the outdated demo in the sample project Supplement the iOS runtime environment in the sample project ## ğŸ•°2022 Roadmap * Major release plan * null-safe version support, expected to be launched on April 22 âœ… * Flutter 2.8.0 version adaptation, expected to be launched in mid-May âœ… * Flutter 2.10.0 version adaptation, is expected to be launched in early June âœ… * Flutter 3.0 version adaptation âœ… * IDE syntax detection and hint plugin âœ… * Rich syntactic sugar âœ… * Hot update platform * Dart Server project construction âœ… * Flutter Web project construction âœ… * Patch/resource management âœ… * Project management âœ… * Mobile Update&Download âœ… * Online dynamic * Flutter Web project construction âœ… * Dart Server project construction âœ… * ActionEdit âœ… * Code editing âœ… * Component editing âœ… * Page editing âœ… * Engineering editor âœ… * Flutter effect preview âœ… * Fair DSL preview âœ… * IDE plug-in * Fair project generation âœ… * Fair template generation âœ… * Fair syntax detection âœ… ## ğŸ“±Accessed APPs

### é¡¹ç›®èƒŒæ™¯ å½“å‰Fairåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šæœ‰ç€ä¸€å®šçš„é—¨æ§›ï¼Œæ–°æ¥è§¦çš„å°ä¼™ä¼´ä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯é˜…è¯»ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—æ¥ä¸Šæ‰‹Fairï¼Œå¤§è‡´éœ€è¦ç»è¿‡ä¸‹é¢çš„å‡ ä¸ªæ­¥éª¤ 1. åˆ›å»ºå·¥ç¨‹ï¼Œé…ç½®ä¾èµ– 2. ç¼–å†™Fairä»£ç ï¼Œæ‰‹åŠ¨ç¼–è¯‘åŠ¨æ€åŒ–äº§ç‰© 3. å°†ç¼–è¯‘äº§ç‰©æ‰‹åŠ¨æ‹·å‡ºï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ–‡ä»¶æˆ–è€…ç½‘ç»œçš„æ–¹å¼åŠ è½½ 4. å®‰è£…é¢„è§ˆæ•ˆæœ å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æ›´æ–°åŠ¨æ€åŒ–äº§ç‰©é‡æ–°é¢„è§ˆæ•ˆæœçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±è¦é‡å¤234æ­¥éª¤ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å¯¹äºä¸Šæ‰‹çš„è¿‡ç¨‹æ˜¯æä¸æ–¹ä¾¿çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨å¼€æºç¤¾åŒºæ”¶åˆ°çš„åé¦ˆä¸­ä¹Ÿæœ‰å¾ˆå¤§ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†æ˜¯æœ‰å…³åŸºç¡€ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚ ç ”å‘Fairé…å¥—å·¥å…·é“¾æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è¾…åŠ©å¼€å‘è€…å¿«é€Ÿä¸Šæ‰‹ Fairå¼€å‘ï¼Œæå‡Fairå¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œè§„é¿Fairä¸æ”¯æŒçš„Flutterè¯­æ³•ï¼Œä¸»è¦åŒ…å«ä¸‰ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼š - å·¥ç¨‹åˆ›å»ºï¼šå¿«é€Ÿæ­å»ºFairè½½ä½“å·¥ç¨‹åŠåŠ¨æ€åŒ–å·¥ç¨‹ - æ¨¡æ¿ä»£ç ï¼šæä¾›é¡µé¢åŠç»„ä»¶æ¨¡æ¿ - æœ¬åœ°çƒ­æ›´æ–°ï¼šçº¿ä¸‹å¼€å‘ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå®ç°å¼€å‘é˜¶æ®µå¿«é€Ÿé¢„è§ˆFairåŠ¨æ€åŒ–åŠŸèƒ½ æˆ‘ä»¬ä»¥dartå‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…·åŠASæ’ä»¶çš„å½¢å¼æä¾›ç»™å¼€å‘è€…ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚ ### æµç¨‹å›¾ > ä½¿ç”¨æµç¨‹å›¾å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
